application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.15 Holly - Remove Ivy (exempt).T.18 Black mulberry - Fell.T.20 Weeping willow - Remove eastern stem and pollard remaining tree to 5m.T.22 Lawson cypress - Fell.T.24 Lime - Pollard to previous points.T.26 Oak - fell (supressed).T.28 Horse chestnut - Deadwood only.T.30 Deodar cedar - Deadwood only.T.33 Deodar cedar - Deadwood only.T.34 Oak - Remove two lowest branches.T.35 Deodar cedar - Remove all deadwood and hanging branches.T.37 Sycamore - Deadwood only.T.53 spruce - Deadwood only.G.2 Lime - Pollard group to previous points & remove single unstable tree.
